snippet.title: Thumb Drift Launch Trailer: FREE on iOS & Android
snippet.description:
Thumb Drift: Out now free on the Apple App Store https://itunes.apple.com/app/thumb-drift-furious-one-touch/id1001425491?ls=1&mt=8&at=10lcrI
Google Play (Android) : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.smgstudio.thumbdrift
More fun car stuff at: http://www.thumbdrift.com

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Music by Jared at Batterie http://batterie.com.au/listen/

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Whether you know how to drift or not, you’ll enjoy sliding sideways around the corners to compete for the highest score.

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING
“Your car is tuned for MAXIMUM DRIFTING ACTION. It's fun!” Toucharcade
“The best drifting game I’ve played” Ken(neth) Block, Ohio
“I want nothing to do with this game. Stop contacting me” : Jeremy Clarkson

WHY PLAY THUMB DRIFT?
- Over 50 fully unlicenced cars to unlock + more to come
- Simple one thumb controls
- Addictive drifting gameplay
- Original soundtrack with 4 pumping tunes
- Challenge your friends for the top score
- Cutting edge, flat shaded, low poly graphics
- Groundbreaking Carticle™ Technology

Got a car we should add to the livery? Get in touch!

SPECIAL GUEST CARS!
- Zen Garage
- Car Throttle
- Domestic Mango
- Street Driven
- Bulletproof Automotive
- King of Nations
- Yasid Design
- Shock Mansion
- Drift All Stars

More to come! 

“If you’re in control, you’re not going fast enough.” : Parnelli Jones
